trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_000<tab>Always a pleasure to greet a new customer. Something I can do for you, friend?

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_001<tab>Your friend's garnered a fair bit of attention, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Suppose it's the novelty. Some folk haven't ever seen a Lalafell. Anyway, what'll it be?
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_002<tab>You meet all sorts of people in this line of work. Good, bad─they've all got their reasons. You too, I suppose.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_003<tab>Suppose I ought to reinforce the doors in case the good ser thinks to grace us with his presence once more...
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_004<tab>Shame Mistress Tataru had to move on. Had grown rather accustomed to having her around.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_005<tab>And there I thought we'd have to make do without her! Don't know how long she'll stick, but we're glad to have her back.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_006<tab>Some folk just can't let go of the past, whereas others can't wait to bury it.

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_007<tab>We've got a collection going for the families that lost their homes. Might surprise you to learn that a good many contributions come from the Brume. Not that they can spare much, but they know better than anyone up above how rough it is down below.

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_008<tab>Raise a glass to the lost, and we poor bastards who can't forget them. Aye, I know─it was a foolish plan, doomed from the start. But there ain't a man here who doesn't understand.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_009<tab>...Never heard of a peace conference ending with a mob chanting for someone's death. Gods help us if we hold a third.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_010<tab>...They've come, have they? Well, don't you worry about me and mine. I can still wield a blade if the battle spills into the city.

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_011<tab>When I heard the Horde was at the gates, I let folk take shelter here at the Knight. Those were a tense few hours─even a few cups of wine couldn't dull the edge of fear for some...

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_012<tab>And then came the news of your victory over Nidhogg. My ears still ring from the deafening cheer that went up from every throat in the room. I swear they meant you to hear it out there on the bridge!

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_013<tab>Recently, the call went out for able hands to help rebuild, and a bunch of our regulars took up the cause. When I find a moment, I'll take them a little something to wet their whistle.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_001<tab>What do you do here?
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_050<tab>Being that it's my tavern, I suppose I can do whatever I please. For the most part, I dispense drinks and advice, as the situation warrants.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_051<tab>Wasn't always so. I did my duty, took my wounds, and hung up my shield, as did the owner before me. You might call it a tradition.

TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_052<tab>They say that the ser who built this tavern was happy to be forgotten. “Rather serve ale instead of steel.” Had a way with words, he did─and with women. But that's a story for another time.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_100<tab>Of all the taverns in all of Ishgard, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> walks into mine...
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_101<tab>And there I was thinking you already knew...
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_110<tab>The Forgotten Knight is just another place for travelers and locals alike to partake of food and drink.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_111<tab>Upstairs, you're like to find more well-to-do regulars mingling with travelers. Downstairs, well, that's where you'll find the locals.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_112<tab>Right or wrong, people have a habit of sticking with their own, and Ishgardians are no different.
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_113<tab>They've got different tastes, to say the least, but we try to cater to them all as best we can.
